channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US Congressman’s Brother Lands No-Bid Contract to Train DHS Snipers
item.description: DHS says retired Marine sniper Dan LaLota’s firm is uniquely qualified to meet the government’s needs. LaLota tells WIRED his brother, GOP congressman...

item.title: Fashion retailers partner to offer personalized AI styling tool ‘Ella’
item.description: Ella provides recommendations to customers across the three retailers on what to purchase or rent to make an outfit come to life.

item.title: Nepal blocks Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, X over rule breach, amid censorship concerns
item.description: Nepal has moved to block 26 social media platforms for failing to comply with its registration requirements.

item.title: Anti-Vaxxers Rejoice at Florida’s Scheme to End Vaccine Mandates for Kids and Everyone Else
item.description: As experts warn about possible outbreaks of diseases like polio and measles in Florida, anti-vaxxers declare “freedom.”

item.title: OpenAI announces AI-powered hiring platform to take on LinkedIn
item.description: The OpenAI Jobs Platform is set to launch in mid-2026, and will use AI to match candidates with businesses.

item.title: X’s encrypted DM feature, XChat, is rolling out more broadly
item.description: Though the feature shipped in beta in May, XChat is now accessible for more users, including those who do not subscribe to X Premium.

item.title: AI logistics startup Augment, from Deliverr’s founder, raises massive $85M Series A
item.description: Having built and sold e-commerce shipping startup Deliverr to Shopify for $2.1 billion in 2022, co-founder and CEO Harish Abbott knows the logistics i...

item.title: Should AI Get Legal Rights?
item.description: Model welfare is an emerging field of research that seeks to determine whether AI is conscious and, if so, how humanity should respond.

item.title: The 35 Best Movies on HBO Max Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Friendship, Final Destination Bloodlines, and Sinners are just a few of the movies you should be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: Neuralink’s Bid to Trademark ‘Telepathy’ and ‘Telekinesis’ Faces Legal Issues
item.description: The brain implant company cofounded by Elon Musk filed to trademark the product names Telepathy and Telekinesis. But it turns out that another person ...
